officialTitle: An Open, Randomised, Cross-over, Single Centre Pharmacokinetic (Phase I) Study of the Biliary Excretion Following Single Doses of AZD0837, Given in the Duodenum Via a Loc-I-Gut Catheter, Alone or in Combination With Ketoconazole (Once Daily for 4 Days), to Young Healthy Male Subjects
inclusionCriteria:
* body mass index (BMI) between 19 to 30 kg/m2 and body weight between 50 to 100 kg inclusive
* Must be MALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 45 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Significant illness, trauma or surgical procedures.
* Clinically significant laboratory abnormalities.
* Clinically significant medical history
